body_html:
@yaroslavvb I got following error with soft_device_placement=False:
InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Cannot assign a device to node 'pack': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available.
[[Node: pack = Pack[N=4, T=DT_INT64, axis=0, _device="/device:GPU:0"](mul_1, floordiv, floordiv_1, mul_3)]]

Unfortunately, it is in the middle of my CNN and it causes data passes to CPU and increases my training time significantly. I appreciate if u have any solution for it.

body:
@yaroslavvb I got following error with soft_device_placement=False:
InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Cannot assign a device to node 'pack': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available.
	 [[Node: pack = Pack[N=4, T=DT_INT64, axis=0, _device="/device:GPU:0"](mul_1, floordiv, floordiv_1, mul_3)]]

Unfortunately, it is in the middle of my CNN and it causes data passes to CPU and increases my training time significantly. I appreciate if u have any solution for it.
